title: De’Aaron Fox | Ep 67  | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: De’Aaron Fox | Ep 67  | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Kings star young point guard De’Aaron Fox and his agent, Chris Gatson join Matt and Stak on episode 67 of All The Smoke. Fox talks about his time at Kentucky with Coach Cal, and signing a super max contract alongside Jayson Tatum, Donovan Mitchell, and Bam Adebayo this summer. Plus, he discusses the teams outlook and his Dad's tweet about this teammate Marvin Bagley. Also, Chris Gatson talks about transitioning from being a trainer to an NBA agent.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
